name: Flow1Sensor
comment: second heating circuit's flow temperature and sensorstate

name: CirPump
comment: control state of the circulation respectively loading pump (functionality of the pump depends on the configuration)

name: Mixer1DutyCycle
comment: Geschwindigkeit mit der der Mischer verfahren wird (negative Werte = Mischer wird geschlossen, positive Werte = Mischer wird geöffnet)

name: Mixer1State
comment: mixer's state

name: InternalOperatingMode
comment: operation mode of the second heating circuit

name: TempDesiredLow
comment: Absenktemperatur des 2. Heizkreises

name: Hc2QuickVetoTemp
comment: manual override setpoint of the second heating circuit

name: Hc2QuickVetoActive
comment: manual override of the second heating circuit enabled

name: Hc2ManualOPRoomTempDesired
comment: room setpoint in operation mode manual of the second heating circuit

name: Hc2CircuitType
comment: type of the second heating circuit

name: FlowTempMin
comment: lower limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature

name: FlowTempMax
comment: upper limitation of the second heating circuit's flow temperature

name: HeatingCurve
comment: heating curve of the second heating circuit

name: HcFlowIncrease
comment: excess temperature (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

name: BoilerCircuitPump
comment: first heating circuit (burner circuit) pump's state

name: FlowTempDesired
comment: flow temperature setpoint of the second heating circuit

name: Hc2RoomControlMode
comment: room temperature modulation of the second heating circuit

name: Hc2SummerOffset
comment: summer offset of the second heating circuit (if outside temperature > room setpoint + summer offset => heating is OFF; applies to comfort and night setback setpoint; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to "thermostat")

name: Hc2PumpAlPort
comment: second heating circuit (mixer circuit) pump's state

name: FloorPavingDryingTemp
comment: flow temperature setpoint for the current day of floor pavement drying

name: FloorPavingDryingDay
comment: Aktiver Tag der estrichtrocknungsfunktion

name: Time
comment: Aktuelle Uhrzeit

name: Date
comment: Aktuelles Datum

name: Weekday
comment: Aktueller Wochentag

name: HcPreHeatingActive
comment: bit-array where a set bit indicates that preheating is active for the corresponding heating circuit

name: ActualTempDesired
comment: current setpoint for the second heating circuit considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

name: MonitorEEpromInkonsiNumber
comment: identification of the last eight EEPROM inconsistencies

name: Hc1PumpKol1PP1Port
comment: first heating circuit pump's state

name: Hc2aLegPumpP2Port
comment: port: open mixer

name: Hc2zPort
comment: port: close mixer

name: SfState
comment: 0 = _SfsNone, 1 = _SfsForceConsumption, 2 = _SfsFloorPavingDrying, 3 = _SfsSummerSwitchOff, 4 =_SfsTankFilling

name: FrostProtState
comment: 0 = _Fps_NoFrost, 1 = _Fps_Delay, 2 = _Fps_PumpKick, 3 = _Fps_KickOff, 4 = _Fps_Active

name: PumpSavingState
comment: 0 = _PssInactive, 1 = _PssMonitoring, 2 = _PssCounting, 3 = _PssPostrun, 4 = _PssSaving

name: OffConfig
comment: 0 = _OffConfig_Off, 1 = _OffConfig_Low

name: FrostProtConfig
comment: 0 = _FrostProtConfig_Low, 1 = _FrostProtConfig_PumpKick

name: DayNightState
comment: 0 = _DnsDay, 1 = _DnsNight

name: ThermostatState
comment: 0 = _ThermOn, 1 =_ThermOff
